<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/register"}

Register a new user with email and password (native authentication)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["email","name","password"],"properties":{"email":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"password":{"type":"string","minLength":8}}}}},"description":"User registration data","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
